headline: Robinhood (HOOD) Leads Gen Z Trading Boom, Piper Sandler Reaffirms Overweight
summary: Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) ranks among the 10 best new stocks to buy in Ray Dalio’s portfolio. (NASDAQ:HOOD) with a $155 price target, citing the company as its top pick to leverage on developing consumer trading trends. The firm emphasized Robinhood’s “unrivaled […]

headline: Why Robinhood (HOOD) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) fell 1.6% in the afternoon session after the U.S. announced potential tariffs on several European countries.
